channel.title: CVE Feed for auburnforest -- Blogmentor – Blog Layouts for Elementor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for auburnforest -- Blogmentor – Blog Layouts for Elementor

item.title: CVE-2024-4623|2024-08-01T20:47:41.219Z -- auburnforest -- blogmentor%20%E2%80%93%20blog%20layouts%20for%20elementor
item.description: The Blogmentor – Blog Layouts for Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘pagination_style’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.5 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-37229|2024-07-22T09:16:05.372Z -- auburnforest -- blogmentor%20%E2%80%93%20blog%20layouts%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in AuburnForest Blogmentor – Blog Layouts for Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Blogmentor – Blog Layouts for Elementor: from n/a through 1.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-4623|2024-06-19T03:12:32.508Z -- auburnforest -- blogmentor%20%E2%80%93%20blog%20layouts%20for%20elementor
item.description: The Blogmentor – Blog Layouts for Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘pagination_style’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.5 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
